entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain beginning early this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 near the Strait of Georgia. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Rain ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 near the Strait of Georgia. High 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 08 February 2023
